category.name: Consolidated Community Announcements
category.description: Events and opportunities of interest across the Open Source Hardware (OSH) ecosystem. Posts to this channel are pushed to the IoPA, OSHWA, GOSH, and OpenToolchain forums concurrently.
category.description_text: Events and opportunities of interest across the Open Source Hardware (OSH) ecosystem. Posts to this channel are pushed to the IoPA, OSHWA, GOSH, and OpenToolchain forums concurrently.
category.cannot_delete_reason: Can't delete this category because it has 2 topics. Oldest topic is $50k fast funding program for low-cost science tools!.
